feed.title: [c-lightning] Welcoming a New C-lightning Core Team Member!

entry.title: [c-lightning] Welcoming a New C-lightning Core Team Member!
entry.summary: In a message posted to the Lightning Development mailing list, ZmnSCPxj questioned whether his GPG setup was satisfactory and suggested that his commit access be revoked if necessary. The context of the post is unclear, but it appears to relate to security concerns around commits to the Lightning Network project. The post includes a link to a previous discussion on the topic.
